item.title: ArgoCD with Kind
item.author: Author
item.description: This post will document how to run an ArgoCD instance locally, using Kind to create the Kubernetes cluster. In addition, I will use cert-manager to create a self-signed certificate to serve it with HTTPS. Creating the cluster with kind First of all, is to have a Kubernetes cluster.
